message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our latest innovation which I believe could significantly benefit your business. After careful consideration and assessment of its value to you, I propose to sell this product to you for $12,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between the product's intrinsic value to us and its perceived value to you, aiming for a mutually beneficial transaction. I trust that this offer will be appealing given the product's potential to enhance your operations. Please let me know your thoughts on this proposal.
